titles.title: Medal of Honor Surviving Spouses Recognition Act of 2019
Medal of Honor Surviving Spouses Recognition Act of 2019

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide payment of Medal of Honor special pension under such title to the surviving spouse of a deceased Medal of Honor recipient, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Medal of Honor Surviving Spouses Recognition Act of 2019
This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs to pay the Medal of Honor special pension to certain surviving spouses of Medal of Honor recipients.
